vote.text: Amendment SA 5029 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5029 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Murphy. (consideration: CR S2407; text: CR S2407) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5029 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Murphy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5029 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
